I had a vbac- great experience,  my recovery was awesome and super easy. My C - section had been just under 2 years prior. Even then, I had a good recovery but it was abdominal surgery, so I was sore and some what limited in my mobility. I am looking forward to another vaginal birth!

Oh and with my c section my water broke and labor never really progressed mu h before her heart rate was in distress.  With no vaginal birth my water did not break but I did begin contractions on my own.
